name: @rubix-code/ini
description: An ini-file parser which supports multi line, multiple levels and arrays to get a maximum of compatibility with Zend config files.

scripts.test: npm run build && NODE_ENV=test mocha test/*.spec.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && ntsc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp readme.md dist/readme.md && cp license dist/license
scripts.distribute: standard-version && npm test && npm publish --access=public dist

author: Rubixcode <contact@rubixcode.com>
